text: Anna-Kari Lindholm Berglund (born November 3, 1976 in Sveg, Sweden) is a Swedish female curler.Landslagsspelare genom tiderna – Damer - Svenska Curlingförbundet (Swedish female national curlers; look at "Lindholm, Anna- Kari") She is a . ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !width="60"|Season!!Skip!!Third!!Second!!Lead!!Alternate Coach!!Events |- | 1996-97 || Maria Engholm (4th) || Margaretha Sigfridsson (skip) || Anna-Kari Lindholm || Maria Halvarsson || Erika Backman || SJCC 1997 |- | 1997-98 || Margaretha Sigfridsson || Maria Engholm || Anna-Kari Lindholm || Mari-Louise Persson || || |- | 1998-99 || Margaretha Sigfridsson || Maria Engholm || Annette Jörnlind || Anna-Kari Lindholm || || |- | 2001-02 || Maria Engholm (4th) || Margaretha Sigfridsson (skip) || Annette Jörnlind || Anna- Kari Lindholm || Ulrika Bergman Andreas Prytz || |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:People from Härjedalen Category:Swedish female curlers
